original_text: When Ahithophel saw that his counsel was not followed, he saddled his donkey and went off home to his own city. He set his house in order and hanged himself, and he died and was buried in the tomb of his father.
korean_text: 아히도벨이 자기 계략이 시행되지 못함을 보고 나귀에 안장을 지우고 일어나 고향으로 돌아가 자기 집에 이르러 집을 정리하고 스스로 목매어 죽으매 그의 조상의 묘에 장사되니라

sentences.original_text: When Ahithophel saw that his counsel was not followed
sentences.korean_translation: 아히도펠이 자신의 모략이 따르지 않음을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: and went off home to his own city
He set his house in order
and was buried in the tomb of his father
